title: Tech Up as Risk Appetite Rises — Tech Roundup
text:
The technology sector rose as traders rotated back into economically sensitive sectors amid hopes that crises in the United Kingdom and Hong Kong could be alleviated.

Apple joined U.S. companies ranging from Deere & Co. to Walt Disney in a recent sprint to issue new bonds, seeking to raise $4 billion to $5 billion in its first bond offering since 2017.

Write to Rob Curran at rob.curran@dowjones.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

September 04, 2019 17:09 ET (21:09 GMT)
